title: Facebook : annual revenue 2009 to 2019
summary: The statistics shows Facebook annual Revenue between the 2009 and 2019 fiscal years .
In the 2019 fiscal Year , the Facebook Motor Corporation generated a Revenue of around 70697 million U.S. dollars .
gold: In 2019 , Facebook 's revenue amounted to 70.7 billion US dollars , up from 55.8 billion U.S. dollars in the previous fiscal year.
The social network 's main source of income is digital advertising.

Facebook revenue and income – more information As a side effect from being the biggest social network worldwide , Facebook is the leading platform for social media advertising and marketing with 94 percent of global marketers utilizing Facebook in their marketing efforts .
